title: Filipino Avocado Milkshake Recipe
description: This avocado milkshake made with milk, sugar, vanilla ice cream, and a whole avocado is a rich and creamy treat and an interesting use of this green fruit!
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Breakfast and Brunch Drinks Filipino Avocado Milkshake 4.7 (63) 48 Reviews 10 Photos This avocado milkshake is rich, creamy, and refreshing. It's a traditional Filipino treat! Submitted by Alexa Updated on February 3, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 10 10 10 10 Prep Time: 5 mins Total Time: 5 mins Servings: 2 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 2 servings 1 medium avocado - peeled, pitted, and cubed 1 ⅓ cups milk 1 scoop vanilla ice cream 5 cubes ice 3 tablespoons white sugar 1 teaspoon fresh lemon or lime juice Directions Combine avocado, milk, ice cream, ice, sugar, and lemon juice in a blender. Purée until smooth. I Made It Print 96 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 337 Calories 19g Fat 38g Carbs 8g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 2 Calories 337 % Daily Value * Total Fat 19g 24% Saturated Fat 5g 25% Cholesterol 18mg 6% Sodium 84mg 4% Total Carbohydrate 38g 14% Dietary Fiber 7g 24% Total Sugars 29g Protein 8g 16% Vitamin C 12mg 13% Calcium 218mg 17% Iron 1mg 3% Potassium 757mg 16% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Filipino Avocado Milkshake 01 of 10 Photo by  Josephine Yuen 02 of 10 Photo by  Tammy Lynn 05/28/2016 I loved this shake and will make it again. I like avocados, but I haven't liked any smoothie/shake recipe with avocado that I've tried so far. This one was different, and I'm sure it was the addition of ice cream. I made it exactly as stated, using a large scoop of ice cream, and it was creamy, cold and perfectly sweet. 03 of 10 Photo by  Tammy Lynn 05/28/2016 I loved this shake and will make it again. I like avocados, but I haven't liked any smoothie/shake recipe with avocado that I've tried so far. This one was different, and I'm sure it was the addition of ice cream. I made it exactly as stated, using a large scoop of ice cream, and it was creamy, cold and perfectly sweet. 04 of 10 Photo by  Josephine Yuen 04/22/2016 05 of 10 Photo by  StrappingYoungLass 01/24/2015 06 of 10 Photo by  terca 08/03/2012 GOOD ! Thanks for the recipe 07 of 10 Photo by  Ildefonso 11/15/2011 so good!! I really enjoyed this. The avocado adds a real richness and creaminess to the shake. Healthy too! fantastic. 08 of 10 Photo by  Ildefonso 11/15/2011 so good!! I really enjoyed this. The avocado adds a real richness and creaminess to the shake. Healthy too! fantastic. 09 of 10 Photo by  Ildefonso 11/15/2011 so good!! I really enjoyed this. The avocado adds a real richness and creaminess to the shake. Healthy too! fantastic. 10 of 10 Photo by  Nani 02/07/2008 Very tasty! First time making it and drinking this as I'm rating it. You can taste the ice cream and just a hint of the avocado. It doesn't overpower the shake one bit! Will definantly make it again. 1 You’ll Also Love Avocado Milkshake 18 Ratings Banana Mango Milkshake 23 Ratings Avocado Energy Booster 7 Ratings Orange Creamsicle Protein Shake 11 Ratings Coconut Avocado Smoothie 40 Ratings Chocolate Spinach Milkshake 1 Rating Breakfast Sweet Tooth 6 Ratings Avocado Smoothie 255 Ratings Funky Monkey 6 Ratings Simple Summer Smoothie 46 Ratings Strawberry-Lime Slushie 4 Ratings Kale and Banana Smoothie 201 Ratings Avocado Blueberry Smoothie 28 Ratings Avocado Shake 1 Rating Gordon's Berry Breakfast Drink 46 Ratings Chocolate Protein Iced Coffee Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Alexa
instructions: Combine avocado, milk, ice cream, ice, sugar, and lemon juice in a blender. Purée until smooth.
